Title: Relates to the reconnection of service for low-income customers
Summary: Relates to the reconnection of service for low-income customers; provides that upon the signing of a reconnection plan where a low-income customer shall pay no more than ten percent of such customer's monthly income plus such customer's current monthly bill a utility shall reconnect such service.
LawCode: Amd ยง35, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the reconnection of service for low-income customers
